 **    **     **        *******//**  **     ****      /**////** //****     **//**     /**   /**  //**     **  //**    /*******   /**    **********   /**////   /**   /**//////**   /**   /**   /**     /**   /**   //    //      //    //
# YAP (Yet Another Pipeline)Pipeline(s) for mapping and cluster-level aggregation of single nucleus methylome and multi-omic datasets.Technologies supported:- snmC-seq(1/2/3)- snmCT-seq (mC + RNA)- snmC2T-seq (mC + RNA + Chromatin Accessibility)- snm3C-seq (mC + Chromatin Conformation)- any NOMe treated version of the above[See Documentation](https://hq-1.gitbook.io/mc/)
